creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: pleated indigo fabric with wide black waistband and white ties with three embroidered tapes near ends, finished with red fringe; wide embroidered tape at apron sides, narrow embroidered tape pleated at bottom edge; embroidered in red and white; two 2-1/2" attached black pieced for center loose over-panel with some geometric embroiderey in reds, gold, green ending in green fringe
dimension: 20 1/4 x 13 in. (51.44 x 33.02 cm) (width at waistband)
title: Apron
